title: Add two phone numbers across homepage contact sections

requirements.text: Update the central contact configuration to support and expose two phone numbers: "+91 7734920728" and "+91 7297963005" (including correct `tel:` links), so UI components can render both numbers consistently.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/config/contact.ts` contains both phone numbers in a structured form usable by multiple components (e.g., a list/array plus any backward-compatible fields if needed).
The stored display strings match exactly: "+91 7734920728" and "+91 7297963005".
The stored `tel:` links correctly map to `tel:+917734920728` and `tel:+917297963005`.

requirements.text: Render both phone numbers (as clickable `tel:` links) anywhere the homepage currently displays a single phone number, including the top bar, footer contact area, and the contact section contact-info block.
acceptanceCriteria: Top bar shows both phone numbers and each is clickable to dial via `tel:`.
Footer contact area shows both phone numbers and each is clickable to dial via `tel:`.
Contact section contact-info block shows both phone numbers and each is clickable to dial via `tel:`.
No phone number currently shown on the homepage remains as a single-number-only rendering (unless it is intentionally WhatsApp-only).

requirements.text: Ensure all call-to-action elements that initiate a phone call (e.g., "Call Now" buttons/links) continue to work after adding the second phone number, with a clear, deterministic behavior (e.g., calling the primary/first number) and without broken links.
acceptanceCriteria: The "Call Now" button in the header navigation works and opens a `tel:` link for a valid phone number.
The "Call Now" button in the contact section works and opens a `tel:` link for a valid phone number.
No TypeScript errors are introduced by the contact config change (project builds successfully).

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose existing UI components only).
Do not modify immutable hook files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`).
nonGoals: Do not add or change backend/canister logic for this request.
Do not add third-party messaging integrations beyond existing WhatsApp linking.
Do not redesign the site layout beyond what is necessary to display the second phone number.
